name: Premonitions
description:
There are people that seek your death, but you have something they don't, you can see the future !

Unmask the assassins that hide amongst the villagers, but be careful not to sentence too many innocents to die...

This game has been made for the Mini Jam 63 : Future.

All sound effects are from ZapSplat.com

Team :

  • Zoé Plane : Art
  • Nicolas Delaunay : Music
  • Anatole Lamarque : Programming & Producing
  • Matthew Rousseau : Programming
  • Pierre Ruth : Programming
